data.actual_result: The mobile presence indicator does not show up and you have no way of knowing if someone is on mobile
data.expected_result: The mobile presence indicator should show on users if you're on a different language
data.short_description: Mobile presence indicator does not show up in another language
data.steps_to_repro: - Have your Discord set to another language (I used Japanese) - Press CTRL+R to reload or restart Discord (as the bug will only work after you have refreshed it)
